languages.text: "Скажу. Твое время закончилось. Все вы — чиновники, {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Касбаллика{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольные Торговцы{/g}, самодовольная аристократия и прочая шваль — скоро сгорите!"

"I will. Your time has passed. All of you — bureaucrats, the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Traders{/g}, conceited aristocracy, and other worthless trash — all of you will soon burn!"
languages.original_text: "Скажу. Твое время закончилось. Все вы — чиновники, {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Касбаллика{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольные Торговцы{/g}, самодовольная аристократия и прочая шваль — скоро сгорите!"

traits.locale_text: "And I will. Your time has passed. All of you — bureaucrats, the Kasballica, Rogue Traders, conceited aristocracy, and other worthless trash — all of you will soon burn!"
"And I will. Your time has passed. All of you — bureaucrats, the Kasballica, Rogue Traders, conceited aristocracy, and other worthless trash — all of you will soon burn!"
"I will. Your time has passed. All of you — bureaucrats, the Kasballica, Rogue Traders, conceited aristocracy, and other worthless trash — all of you will soon burn!"
"I will. Your time has passed. All of you — bureaucrats, the Kasballica, Rogue Traders, conceited aristocracy, and other worthless trash — all of you will soon burn!"

"I will. Your time has passed. All of you — bureaucrats, the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Traders{/g}, conceited aristocracy, and other worthless trash — all of you will soon burn!"

languages.text: “我确实有话要说。你们的时代已经过去了。你们所有人，帝国官员、{g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}卡斯巴利卡{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}、自负的贵族，还有其他那些毫无价值的垃圾，用不了多久，都会被烈火吞噬！”
languages.original_text: "I will. Your time has passed. All of you — bureaucrats, the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Traders{/g}, conceited aristocracy, and other worthless trash — all of you will soon burn!"

traits.locale_text: “我确实有话要说。你们的时代已经过去了。你们所有人，帝国官员、{g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}卡斯巴利卡{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}、自负的贵族，还有其他那些毫无价值的垃圾，用不了多久，都会被烈火吞噬！”

languages.text: «Eso haré. Vuestro tiempo ha pasado. Todos vosotros: los burócratas, la {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}, los {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciantes Independientes{/g}, los aristócratas engreídos y el resto de la chusma inservible, ¡todos arderéis pronto!».
languages.original_text: "I will. Your time has passed. All of you — bureaucrats, the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Traders{/g}, conceited aristocracy, and other worthless trash — all of you will soon burn!"

traits.locale_text: «Eso haré. Vuestro tiempo ha pasado. Todos vosotros: los burócratas, la {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}, los {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciantes Independientes{/g}, los aristócratas engreídos y el resto de la chusma inservible, ¡todos arderéis pronto!».

languages.text: 「そうするとも。お前達の時代は終わりだ。官吏、 {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}カスバリカ{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}、自惚れた貴族達、他にも取るに足らないゴミ屑ども…どいつもこいつも今に焼き尽くす！」
languages.original_text: "I will. Your time has passed. All of you — bureaucrats, the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Traders{/g}, conceited aristocracy, and other worthless trash — all of you will soon burn!"

traits.locale_text: 「そうするとも。お前達の時代は終わりだ。官吏、 {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}カスバリカ{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}、自惚れた貴族達、他にも取るに足らないゴミ屑ども…どいつもこいつも今に焼き尽くす！」

languages.text: "Wie Ihr wünscht. Eure Zeit ist vorbei. Ihr alle – Bürokraten, die {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Freihändler{/g}, der affige Adel und anderer wertloser Abfall – Ihr alle werdet schon bald brennen!"
languages.original_text: "I will. Your time has passed. All of you — bureaucrats, the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Traders{/g}, conceited aristocracy, and other worthless trash — all of you will soon burn!"

traits.locale_text: "Wie Ihr wünscht. Eure Zeit ist vorbei. Ihr alle – Bürokraten, die {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Freihändler{/g}, der affige Adel und anderer wertloser Abfall – Ihr alle werdet schon bald brennen!"

languages.text: « Je ne vais pas me gêner. Votre époque est révolue. Vos semblables et vous... Les bureaucrates, la {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}, les {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}libres-marchands{/g}, l'aristocratie vaniteuse, et tous les autres bons à rien du genre... Vous ne tarderez plus à brûler ! »
languages.original_text: "I will. Your time has passed. All of you — bureaucrats, the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Traders{/g}, conceited aristocracy, and other worthless trash — all of you will soon burn!"

traits.locale_text: « Je ne vais pas me gêner. Votre époque est révolue. Vos semblables et vous... Les bureaucrates, la {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}, les {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}libres-marchands{/g}, l'aristocratie vaniteuse, et tous les autres bons à rien du genre... Vous ne tarderez plus à brûler ! »

languages.text: "Söyleyeceğim ya. Mazide kaldınız. Bürokratı, {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica'sı{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir'i{/g}, burnu havada aristokratları... Alayınız yakında yanacaksınız!"
languages.original_text: "I will. Your time has passed. All of you — bureaucrats, the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Traders{/g}, conceited aristocracy, and other worthless trash — all of you will soon burn!"

traits.locale_text: "Söyleyeceğim ya. Zamanınız geçti. Bürokratı, {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}'sı, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g}'i, mağrur aristokrasisi... Kim varsa, hepiniz yakında yanacaksınız!"
